comment:
* This class is used by {@link CloudMediaProvider} to send {@link Surface} state updates to
     * picker launched via {@link MediaStore#ACTION_PICK_IMAGES}.
     *
     * @see MediaStore#ACTION_PICK_IMAGES

variables.name: PLAYBACK_STATE_BUFFERING
variables.comment: * Constant to notify that the playback is buffering

variables.name: PLAYBACK_STATE_READY
variables.comment: * Constant to notify that the playback is ready to be played

variables.name: PLAYBACK_STATE_STARTED
variables.comment: * Constant to notify that the playback has started

variables.name: PLAYBACK_STATE_PAUSED
variables.comment: * Constant to notify that the playback is paused.

variables.name: PLAYBACK_STATE_COMPLETED
variables.comment: * Constant to notify that the playback has completed

variables.name: PLAYBACK_STATE_ERROR_RETRIABLE_FAILURE
variables.comment: * Constant to notify that the playback has failed with a retriable error.

variables.name: PLAYBACK_STATE_ERROR_PERMANENT_FAILURE
variables.comment: * Constant to notify that the playback has failed with a permanent error.

variables.name: PLAYBACK_STATE_MEDIA_SIZE_CHANGED
variables.comment:
* Constant to notify that the media size is first known or has changed.
         *
         * Pass the width and height of the media as a {@link Point} inside the {@link Bundle} with
         * {@link ContentResolver#EXTRA_SIZE} as the key.
         *
         * @see CloudMediaSurfaceStateChangedCallback#setPlaybackState(int, int, Bundle)
         * @see MediaPlayer.OnVideoSizeChangedListener#onVideoSizeChanged(MediaPlayer, int, int)

methods.name: public void setPlaybackState(int surfaceId, @PlaybackState int playbackState, @Nullable Bundle playbackStateInfo)
methods.comment:
* This is called to notify playback state update for a {@link Surface}
         * on the picker launched via {@link MediaStore#ACTION_PICK_IMAGES}.
         *
         * @param surfaceId id which uniquely identifies a {@link Surface}
         * @param playbackState playback state to notify picker about
         * @param playbackStateInfo {@link Bundle} which may contain extra information about the
         *                          playback state, such as media size, progress/seek info or
         *                          details about errors.

methodNames: public void setPlaybackState(int surfaceId, @PlaybackState int playbackState, @Nullable Bundle playbackStateInfo)
